parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.76

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Remote Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns UAV if unit has connection to some UAV.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[getConnectedUAV]] unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]] - the UAV. [[objNull]] if no UAV is connected.

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[getConnectedUAV]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[showUAVFeed]] [[shownUAVFeed]] [[allUnitsUAV]] [[UAVControl]] [[connectTerminalToUAV]] [[isUAVConnected]]
</value></part></template></root>
